location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Colonel Thomas Matthias Weguelin, Commissary General, Bengal

mods.abstract: Letter refers to a request, made on 22 December 1813, by Major William Cowper, Commissary General at Bombay, for William Bruce to send a consignment of native sulphur to the Bengal Government. Bruce informs Weguelin that one hundred bags of native sulphur have been shipped on the Ahmed Shah,and that a further supply will be sent as soon as it is received from the mines. Includes an invoice for the initial supply of native sulphur.
